args.natural_language_statement: Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary, with Q connected, is a covering map.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f : M ‚Üí N is a local diffeomorphism between manifolds without boundary and f is proper, then f is a covering map when N is connected.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

/- If f : M ‚Üí N is a local diffeomorphism between manifolds without boundary and f is proper, then f is a covering map when N is connected. -/

open Manifold

variable {ùïú : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ùïú]
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ùïú E]
variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ùïú F]
variable {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H]
variable {G : Type*} [TopologicalSpace G]

variable {P : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [ChartedSpace H P]
variable {Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Q] [ChartedSpace G Q]

theorem proper_local_diffeomorphism.is_covering_map (f : P ‚Üí Q)
  (n : WithTop ‚Ñï‚àû)
  (hf : IsLocalDiffeomorph ùïú (ModelWithCorners.core ùïú E H) (ModelWithCorners.core ùïú F G) n f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Q) : IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.
-/

open Function

variable {ùïú : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ùïú]
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ùïú E]
variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ùïú F]
variable {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H] {G : Type*} [TopologicalSpace G]

variable (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) (J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G)

variable {P : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [ChartedSpace H P]
variable {Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Q] [ChartedSpace G Q]

/-- If f : P ‚Üí Q is a proper local diffeomorphism between manifolds (without boundary)
and Q is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_diffeomorphism.is_covering_map
  {n : WithTop ‚Ñï‚àû} (f : P ‚Üí Q)
  (hf : IsLocalDiffeomorph I J n f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Q) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.
-/

variable {ùïú : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ùïú]
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ùïú E]
variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ùïú F]
variable {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H]
variable {G : Type*} [TopologicalSpace G]

/-- If f : P ‚Üí Q is a proper local diffeomorphism between manifolds (without boundary)
and Q is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_diffeomorphism.is_covering_map
  {n : WithTop ‚Ñï‚àû} {P : Type*} {Q : Type*}
  [TopologicalSpace P] [ChartedSpace H P]
  [TopologicalSpace Q] [ChartedSpace G Q]
  (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) (J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G)
  (f : P ‚Üí Q)
  (hf : IsLocalDiffeomorph I J n f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Q) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.
-/

variable {ùïú : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ùïú]
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ùïú E]
variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ùïú F]
variable {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H]
variable {G : Type*} [TopologicalSpace G]

variable {P : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [ChartedSpace H P]
variable {Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Q] [ChartedSpace G Q]

/-- If f : P ‚Üí Q is a proper local diffeomorphism between manifolds (without boundary)
and Q is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_diffeomorphism_is_covering_map
  {n : WithTop ‚Ñï‚àû}
  (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) (J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G)
  (f : P ‚Üí Q)
  (hf : IsLocalDiffeomorph I J n f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Q) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

args.query: IsLocalDiffeomorph is a local homeomorph Lean4 mathlib IsLocalDiffeomorph implies IsLocalHomeomorph

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.

This file states a slightly more general topological version: a proper local
homeomorphism between topological spaces with connected target is a covering map.
-/

variable {P Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [TopologicalSpace Q]

/-- If f : P ‚Üí Q is a proper local homeomorphism and Q is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_homeomorph.is_covering_map (f : P ‚Üí Q)
  (hf : IsLocalHomeomorph f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Q) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.

We state a topological version: a proper local homeomorphism with connected
target is a covering map.
-/

variable {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]

/-- If f : X ‚Üí Y is a proper local homeomorphism and Y is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_homeomorph_is_covering_map (f : X ‚Üí Y)
  (hf : IsLocalHomeomorph f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Y) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Every proper local diffeomorphism f : P ‚Üí Q between manifolds without boundary,
with Q connected, is a covering map.

We state a topological version: a proper local homeomorphism with connected
target is a covering map.
-/

universe u v

/-- If f : X ‚Üí Y is a proper local homeomorphism and Y is connected, then f is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_homeomorph_is_covering_map {X : Type u} {Y : Type v} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (f : X ‚Üí Y)
  (hf : IsLocalHomeomorph f)
  (hproper : IsProperMap f)
  (hconn : IsConnected Y) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry
